description:
The Makkah Royal Clock Tower pushes engineering to the extreme.
Skip the waitlist and invest in blue-chip art for the very first time by signing up for Masterworks - https://www.masterworks.art/theb1m

Purchase shares in great masterpieces from artists like Pablo Picasso, Banksy, Andy Warhol, and more.

This video contains paid promotion for Masterworks. See important Masterworks disclosures - https://www.masterworks.com/cd

Full story here - https://www.theb1m.com/video/saudi-arabia-built-a-16bn-clock-tower

Additional footage and images courtesy of SL Rasch.

We're raising awareness of construction's mental health crisis through our Get Construction Talking initiative. There’s a video series on our channel and you can find support or donate at - https://www.getconstructiontalking.org/

title: Saudi Arabia Built a $16BN Clock Tower
Saudi Arabia Built The World’s BIGGEST Clock
